features.name: Web Request Adapter Configuration
features.description: Allows administrators to configure and save the default web server request adapter for handling HTTP requests
features.ui_location: Settings > Servers > Web Request Adapter dropdown
test_scenarios: Select a different web request adapter
Verify adapter change persists after page reload
Verify default adapter is displayed correctly

features.name: Server List Management
features.description: Displays and manages all configured web servers in the DNN installation with filtering capabilities

features.name: Server Configuration Editing
features.description: Allows editing of individual server settings including URL, server group, and enabled status
features.ui_location: Settings > Servers > Server List > Click on server row
test_scenarios: Edit server URL with valid URL
Edit server URL with invalid URL and verify validation
Verify URL validation with KeepAlive.aspx endpoint
Verify changes persist after page reload

features.name: Server Deletion
features.description: Allows administrators to delete web servers from the configuration with confirmation dialog
features.ui_location: Settings > Servers > Server List > Delete button on server row
test_scenarios: Verify server is removed from list after deletion
Verify delete button is disabled when only one server exists

features.name: Memory Usage Monitoring
features.description: Displays real-time memory usage statistics including private bytes, cache count, and memory limits
features.ui_location: Settings > Servers > Server Details > Memory Usage section
test_scenarios: Verify memory usage format (KB, MB, GB)
Refresh page and verify updated memory statistics

features.name: Cache Items Browsing
features.description: Browse and view paginated list of cached items with DNN_ prefix in the application cache
features.ui_location: Settings > Servers > Server Details > Cache Items button
test_scenarios: Select a cache item to view details

features.name: Cache Item Deletion
features.description: Delete individual cache items from the application cache with immediate effect
features.ui_location: Settings > Servers > Cache Items > Expire Cache Item button
test_scenarios: Verify cache item is removed from list
Test deletion with DNN_ prefix handling
Verify deleted item cannot be retrieved

features.name: Caching Provider Information
features.description: Displays caching configuration including providers, web farm status, SSL settings, and IIS app name usage
features.ui_location: Settings > Servers > Main view (loaded with server info)
test_scenarios: Check IIS app name usage status

features.name: Server Information Display
features.description: Displays detailed server information including name, IIS app name, creation date, and last activity date
features.ui_location: Settings > Servers > Server List > Expanded server row
test_scenarios: View server creation date with proper formatting
View last activity date with proper formatting

features.name: SSL Offload Header Configuration
features.description: Retrieves and displays SSL offload header configuration value from host settings
test_scenarios: Verify empty string handling when not configured
Verify value persistence in host settings
